data.name: Raatihuone
data.detailed_description:
In Raatihuone, the player takes on the role of a janitor who is tasked with fixing the city hall clock. After fixing said clock the player is transported to the past and has to solve puzzles in order to find a way back home.

The game aims to teach and tell the history of Kajaani city hall through interactive play. While exploring the site throughout the eras, the player learns many interesting tidbits about the history and the different stages of the city hall. Players will learn how the city hall operated and how it used to look throughout its’ history.

The game environment was modeled in co-operation with the Kainuu Museum and Finnish museum association and utilized old pictures, photogrammetry and documents to accurately match the 30’s and 60’s.

data.short_description: Raatihuone is a virtual reality experience where you travel through the history of Kajaani city hall and solve interesting puzzles.
